6db6aaf6-1667-47ed-ab42-6384e7691ff3.description: The earner of this badge has created their own certificate program by taking 90 hours worth of credit in one or more technology or PM topics at the Workforce Center.

6d7f309c-5a94-4b17-a0d7-7b4edc38aaf5.description: The earner of this badge has completed 72 hours worth of courses pertaining to software engineering and architecture including C++, software product line engineering, Model-Based System Engineering (MBSE) (Cameo), Advanced .NET/C# Programming, Python, Advanced OpenGL, Vulkan, and Service Oriented Architecture.
